page.title: 12BRILL LIBRARY,P.O.,NEWSAGENT
page.content: The library is open on Tuesday and Fri- day.It has 2,500 books which are in 7 different sections: reference,adult, junior,children,adult fiction,adult non -fiction and large print.It gets its books from Haddenham library.Tickets can be used at Haddenham and Long Cren -don. The Bernewode News is a month- ly magazine that covers 13 parishes. It gives general news about the area and has advertisments for local businesses,items for sale and church and village events.The post office opens every day except Sun and Wed pm. It deals with pensions,stamps,Girobank, National Savings Bank and licences. There are 2 postladies and 1 postman. The letters are sorted at Aylesbury where the main post office is.There are 2 collections a day.Brill's own paper shop sells different local and national papers.Brill has a phone box.
